title: Someting missing with Arcade Sona
body: Can we please get a back animation? Out of the whole set she's the only one that doesn't have one. Kind of sucks when you have almost everyone else in a typical game with cool animations and you just stand there..... possibly judging....?

replies.body: while they are at it they can remove the garbage bear cavalry sejuani back animation or lower the price that animation makes it worth which is about 520
The main issue is you have a set of skins all priced at 1350 and one of them is pretty much a 975 worth since she just waits patiently doing nothing cool.
cool better then what most recalls do

I agree that it would be a lot better to have a back ani for the arcade sona skin........but didnt they give us 3 diff back animations for the DJ Sona skin???  I am still only a month or so into this game, but I can't think of any champs (that I have seen)  that have more than 1 diff back ani for all of their skins.  Does anyone know if they have done that in the past?  If not, then you have your answer as to why there is not a back ani on the arcade skin for Sona.


Riot.........would be nice to have a back ani on her though ;D....... yes please!

It's more about the asking price vs. it's actual value. DJ is an ultimate, much like Pulsefire {{champion:81}} and that skin changes with how many points are in his ult. 

Riot asking for a price that the skin should have a custom back animation, and the skin not having one is kind of lame.

Hey Hatless Casual, 

At this time, we don't have plans to add a recall animation to Arcade Sona.
Yeah, why would you wanna give something to a thing people have already paid for, that'd be unprofitable!
Or...they could be working on other more pressing matters?
